statements: SELECT * FROM student_interactions;
SELECT student_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM student_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, assignment_id FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE quiz_id > 5;
SELECT student_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM student_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_interactions > 3 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;

SELECT student_id, interaction_type, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'quiz' GROUP BY student_id, interaction_type HAVING interaction_count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, interaction_type FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY student_id, interaction_type;
SELECT student_id, assignment_id, DATE(interaction_date) AS date FROM student_interactions WHERE DATE(interaction_date) = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM student_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT student_id, interaction_type FROM student_interactions WHERE quiz_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT quiz_type FROM quiz_assignments;
SELECT assignment_id, completion_status FROM quiz_assignments WHERE quiz_id = 5;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, interaction_time FROM student_interactions ORDER BY student_id ASC, quiz_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 5 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT quiz_type FROM quiz_assignments WHERE completion_status = 'completed';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT S.student_id, A.quiz_type, S.interaction_time FROM student_interactions S JOIN quiz_assignments A ON S.quiz_id = A.quiz_id WHERE S.interaction_type = 'review' ORDER BY S.interaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_topic = 'Math';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_deadline FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id > 3 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_topic = 'Mathematics';
SELECT quiz_name FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assignment_deadline > NOW() ORDER BY assignment_deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 90;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_date FROM Quizzes ORDER BY quiz_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Assignments WHERE assignment_due_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_name, assignment_name, interaction_type FROM Students JOIN Assignments ON Students.student_id = Assignments.assignment_id JOIN Interaction_Log ON Students.student_id = Interaction_Log.student_id ORDER BY student_name ASC, interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, quiz_name AS QuizTitle FROM Students INNER JOIN Quizzes ON Students.student_id = Quizzes.quiz_id;
SELECT student_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Interaction_Log ON Students.student_id = Interaction_Log.student_id WHERE interaction_type = 'attendance';
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE quiz_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Quizzes WHERE max_score > 50;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM Assignments ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM StudentQuizScores WHERE score >= 80;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT quiz_name, max_score FROM Quizzes ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, deadline FROM Assignments WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, q.quiz_name, sq.score FROM Students s JOIN StudentQuizScores sq ON s.student_id = sq.student_id JOIN Quizzes q ON sq.quiz_id = q.quiz_id;
